episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a range of intriguing topics, including the historical experiment by Antoine Lavoisier on animal metabolism, the unique methods used by Britain's leak detection team, the surprising fact about Japan's cybersecurity minister, and a peculiar lawsuit by a Mumbai businessman against his parents.

facts.fact: Animal metabolism was first proven by Antoine Lavoisier in an experiment where he put a guinea pig in a freezer.
Britain has a special team of leak detectives who listen to the sound of water using a special stick.
Japan's cybersecurity minister has never used a computer.
A Mumbai businessman is trying to sue his parents for giving birth to him.
